elin-solidity/contracts/token/StandardToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x35b13927cbe4791b1b9f6c1e86e5b1b9b30ea0b0930ab5dae1c42c501ee7de4b","urls":["bzzr://a7b6847cbb37bf88c46025fcd55c9653449150dab968ec3de1dc4eaebe34cb6d"]},"/c/UNICEF/dev/connect-bc/bids-api/blockchain/contracts/openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/token/VestedToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdd29e86f2de806702915fdaffc9d4ccbf2f01af20dca373a0c63a8ca35d8f740","urls":["bzzr://156a8b6047ea73abc09e691cef2a9871648aff613a80f1c317b02a47e57c9df2"]}},"version":1}

nodes.name: lastTokenIsTransferableDate

allowance(address,address).details: Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

params._owner: address The address which owns the funds.
params._spender: address The address which will spend the funds.

allowance(address,address).return: A uint256 specifying the amount of tokens still available for the spender.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender.    * Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729

params._spender: The address which will spend the funds.
params._value: The amount of tokens to be spent.

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params._owner: The address to query the the balance of.

balanceOf(address).return: An uint256 representing the amount owned by the passed address.

calculateVestedTokens(uint256,uint256,ui.details: Calculate amount of vested tokens at a specific time

params.cliff: uint64  The cliff period, the period before nothing can be paid out
params.start: uint64 The time representing the beginning of the grant
params.time: uint64 The time to be checked
params.tokens: uint256 The amount of tokens granted

calculateVestedTokens(uint256,uint256,ui.return: An uint256 representing the amount of vested tokens of a specific grant transferableTokens  |                         _/--------   vestedTokens rect  |                       _/  |                     _/  |                   _/  |                 _/  |                /  |              .|  |            .  |  |          .    |  |        .      |  |      .        |  |    .          |  +===+===========+---------+----------> time     Start       Cliff    Vesting

grantVestedTokens(address,uint256,uint64.details: Grant tokens to a specified address

params._cliff: uint64 Time of the cliff period.
params._start: uint64 Time of the beginning of the grant.
params._to: address The address which the tokens will be granted to.
params._value: uint256 The amount of tokens to be granted.

lastTokenIsTransferableDate(address).details: Calculate the date when the holder can transfer all its tokens

params.holder: address The address of the holder

lastTokenIsTransferableDate(address).return: An uint256 representing the date of the last transferable tokens.

revokeTokenGrant(address,uint256).details: Revoke the grant of tokens of a specifed address.

params._grantId: The id of the token grant.
params._holder: The address which will have its tokens revoked.

tokenGrant(address,uint256).details: Get all information about a specific grant.

params._grantId: The id of the token grant.
params._holder: The address which will have its tokens revoked.

tokenGrant(address,uint256).return: Returns all the values that represent a TokenGrant(address, value, start, cliff, revokability, burnsOnRevoke, and vesting) plus the vested value at the current time.

tokenGrantsCount(address).details: Check the amount of grants that an address has.
tokenGrantsCount(address).return: A uint256 representing the total amount of grants.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Checks modifier and allows transfer if tokens are not locked.

params._to: The address that will receive the tokens.
params._value: The amount of tokens to be transferred.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Checks modifier and allows transfer if tokens are not locked.

params._from: The address that will send the tokens.
params._to: The address that will receive the tokens.
params._value: The amount of tokens to be transferred.

transferableTokens(address,uint64).details: Calculate the total amount of transferable tokens of a holder at a given time

params.holder: address The address of the holder

transferableTokens(address,uint64).return: An uint256 representing a holder's total amount of transferable tokens.

increaseApproval(address,uint256).notice: approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until the first transaction is mined) From MonolithDAO Token.sol
